subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Steve Nash, the Phoenix Suns’ point guard, is a top contender to win his third consecutive Most Valuable Player award, which would make him only the fourth N.B.A. player to accomplish the feat.
snippet: Steve Nash, the Phoenix Suns’ point guard, is a top contender to win his third consecutive Most Valuable Player award, which would make him only the fourth N.B.A. player to accomplish the feat.
